title: Practical Training in Manequin-Based Pure-Tone Audiometry Simulation

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of pure-tone audiometry fundamentals and clinical assessment protocols
context.additional_context: High-difficulty simulation training for in-service professionals, structured in a blended learning environment using personal devices (BYOD).

learning_goals: Perform pure-tone audiometry procedures with high precision, within a 5dB margin of error
Recreate clinical workflows similar to real-world settings using mannequin simulation tools
Derive clinical judgments based on audiometric test results with over 80% accuracy
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
